name: mangalith
description: Lector de manga open source completo y personalizable

scripts.setup: pnpm run validate:env && pnpm install:all && pnpm run setup:db
scripts.validate:env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const required = ['POSTGRES_DB', 'POSTGRES_USER', 'POSTGRES_PASSWORD', 'JWT_SECRET']; const missing = required.filter(key => !process.env[key]); if(missing.length) { console.error('❌ Variables de entorno faltantes:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ Variables de entorno validadas'); }"
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && pnpm prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && pnpm prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && pnpm prisma migrate reset

author: Mangalith Team
